scripts.build: yarn hardhat compile && yarn generate-contract-types && yarn compile-ts
scripts.generate-contract-types: rm -rf contract-types && typechain --target=web3-v1 './artifacts/contracts/**/*[!dbg].json' --out-dir contract-types/web3 && typechain --target=truffle-v5 './artifacts/contracts/**/*[!dbg].json' --out-dir contract-types/truffle && typechain --target=ethers-v5 './artifacts/contracts/**/*[!dbg].json' --out-dir contract-types/ethers
scripts.compile-ts: rm -rf types dist && mkdir -p types/contract-types && rsync -R contract-types/**/*.d.ts ./types && tsc
